validFrom.description: The date on which some thing become invalid or expired. If validFrom's value is of type String, that value must be a valid ISO 8601 format. If validFrom'a value is of type Number, that value must be a valid Unix datetime stamp. If unknown, set validTo's date to null.
validFrom.title: EffectiveDates.validFrom schema

validTo.description: The date on which some thing become valid or effective. If validTo's value is of type String, then that value must be a valid ISO 8601 format. If validTo's value is of type Number, that value must be a valid Unix datetime stamp. If the date is either unknown or valid, set validTo's date to null.
validTo.title: EffectiveDates.validTo
